ğŸš€ Quick Start â€‹

Get your backend running in under 60 seconds:

bash
npx create-nextjs-backend
bash
yarn create nextjs-backend
bash
pnpm create nextjs-backend
bash
bunx create-nextjs-backend

ğŸ’¡ What happens next?

Our interactive CLI guides you through:

  1. âœ… Router type selection (App Router recommended)
  2. âœ… Skill level choice (Beginner â†’ Expert)
  3. âœ… Structure mode (Basic/Full/Modular)
  4. âœ… Template selection (if Modular)
  5. âœ… Project generation with all files ready

ğŸ¯ Why Choose Create Next.js Backend? â€‹

â±ï¸ Save Weeks of Development â€‹

Skip the boring setup. Get 2-4 weeks of boilerplate work done in 5 minutes. Focus on building features, not infrastructure.

ğŸ—ï¸ Industry Best Practices â€‹

Every template follows Next.js 16 conventions, TypeScript standards, and security best practices used by top engineering teams.

ğŸ”’ Security Built-In â€‹

Common vulnerabilities already handled: XSS protection, CSRF tokens, SQL injection prevention, rate limiting, and more.

ğŸ“ˆ Scales With You â€‹

Start small with Beginner templates. Upgrade to Advanced features as you grow. All templates work together seamlessly.

ğŸ“ Learn While Building â€‹

Each template is well-documented with inline comments explaining the "why" behind architectural decisions.

ğŸ†“ Truly Open Source â€‹

MIT licensed. No vendor lock-in. No hidden costs. You own 100% of the generated code forever.

ğŸŸ¢ Beginner (50 Templates) â€‹

Perfect for: First-time backend developers, MVPs, hackathons, learning projects

What's Included:

  • âœ… Email System - SendGrid, AWS SES, SMTP, templates
  • âœ… Payment Gateways - Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay, crypto
  • âœ… Caching - Redis, in-memory, CDN integration
  • âœ… Validation - Zod, Yup, Joi schemas
  • âœ… Health Checks - Liveness, readiness, dependencies
  • âœ… Documentation - Swagger, OpenAPI, AsyncAPI

Time to Production: 1-2 weeks

Explore Expert Templates â†’

ğŸ¨ Featured Template Categories â€‹

ğŸ” Authentication & Security (25+ templates)

Authentication Methods:

  • JWT - Stateless token-based authentication with refresh tokens
  • OAuth2 - Google, GitHub, Facebook, Apple, Discord, LinkedIn, Microsoft, Twitter, Spotify
  • WebAuthn/Passkey - Passwordless biometric authentication
  • Magic Link - Email-based passwordless login
  • OTP - SMS/Email one-time passwords with Twilio/SendGrid
  • SAML/LDAP - Enterprise SSO integration
  • Session Management - Secure server-side sessions with Redis
  • Multi-Factor Auth - TOTP, SMS, Email 2FA/MFA

Security Features:

  • Rate Limiting - Token bucket, sliding window, Redis-backed
  • IP Whitelisting - Geo-blocking, IP reputation checks
  • Bot Protection - reCAPTCHA v3, hCaptcha, Cloudflare Turnstile
  • CSRF Protection - Token-based cross-site request forgery prevention
  • XSS Prevention - Input sanitization, output encoding
  • SQL Injection Prevention - Parameterized queries, ORM security
  • Data Encryption - AES-256, RSA, field-level encryption
  • Audit Logging - Complete activity trails for compliance
ğŸ’³ Payments & Commerce (15+ templates)

Payment Gateways:

  • Stripe - Full integration with webhooks, subscriptions, invoices
  • PayPal - Checkout, subscriptions, payouts, disputes
  • Razorpay - Indian payment gateway with UPI, cards, wallets
  • Square - POS integration, online payments
  • Cryptocurrency - Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDC payments via Coinbase/BitPay
  • Braintree - PayPal-owned gateway for cards and digital wallets
  • Paddle - Merchant of record with tax handling
  • LemonSqueezy - Modern merchant of record for digital products

Payment Features:

  • Subscription Management - Plans, trials, upgrades, downgrades, proration
  • Invoice Generation - PDF invoices with templates, automatic delivery
  • Recurring Billing - Automatic charges, dunning management
  • Buy Now Pay Later - Klarna, Affirm, Afterpay integration
  • In-App Purchases - Apple IAP, Google Play billing
  • Affiliate Tracking - Commission tracking, payout management
  • Loyalty Programs - Points, tiers, rewards catalog
ğŸ¤– AI & Machine Learning (25+ templates)

LLM Integration:

  • OpenAI - GPT-4, GPT-4 Turbo, DALL-E 3, Whisper, TTS
  • Anthropic Claude - Claude 3 Opus, Sonnet, Haiku
  • Cohere - Command models, embeddings, rerank
  • Langchain - LLM orchestration, chains, agents, memory
  • AI Agents - Autonomous agents with tool calling, planning
  • Prompt Engineering - Template system, few-shot learning

Vector Databases:

  • Pinecone - Managed vector search, hybrid search
  • Weaviate - Open-source vector DB with GraphQL
  • Qdrant - High-performance vector similarity search
  • Milvus - Scalable vector database for billions of vectors
  • Chroma - Lightweight embeddings database
  • FAISS - Facebook's similarity search library

ML Operations:

  • Model Deployment - FastAPI, TensorFlow Serving, TorchServe
  • Model Monitoring - Drift detection, performance tracking
  • Feature Store - Feast, Tecton integration
  • Experiment Tracking - MLflow, Weights & Biases
  • Computer Vision - Object detection, face recognition, OCR
  • NLP - Sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, summarization
ğŸ“Š Analytics & Data (35+ templates)

Product Analytics:

  • Heap - Automatic event capture, retroactive analysis

Data Infrastructure:

  • Data Warehouses - Snowflake, Google BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Databricks
  • ETL Pipelines - Apache Airflow, Dagster, Prefect workflows
  • Time-Series DBs - InfluxDB, TimescaleDB, Prometheus, QuestDB
  • Data Lakes - AWS S3 + Delta Lake, Azure Data Lake, Iceberg
  • Stream Processing - Apache Flink, Kafka Streams, Spark Streaming
  • BI Tools - Tableau, PowerBI, Looker, Metabase, Superset

Data Management:

  • CDC (Change Data Capture) - Debezium, event sourcing
  • Data Catalog - Metadata management, lineage tracking
  • Master Data Management - Golden records, deduplication
  • Data Quality - Profiling, validation, cleansing
  • Data Virtualization - Federated queries, caching

Email:

Team Communication:

ğŸ¤ Contributing â€‹

We â¤ï¸ contributions! Here's how you can help:

ğŸ› Report Bugs â€‹

Found a bug? Open an issue

Have an idea? Request a feature

ğŸ“ Improve Documentation â€‹

Spot a typo or want to clarify something? Submit a PR to our docs

ğŸ”§ Submit Templates â€‹

Created an awesome template? Share it with the community!

  1. Fork the repository
  2. Create your template in templates/your-template/
  3. Add proper TypeScript types and documentation
  4. Write tests for your template
  5. Submit a pull request

Template Requirements:

  • âœ… Full TypeScript support
  • âœ… Inline JSDoc comments
  • âœ… Error handling
  • âœ… Unit tests (if applicable)
  • âœ… README with usage examples
  • âœ… Follows our code style guide

â­ Star the Repository â€‹

Show your support by starring us on GitHub!
